 ******************************************************************************************************************** */export const addNewValueToStringArray=(arr,newValue)=>{return newValue&&!arr.includes(newValue)?[...arr,newValue]:arr;};export const addNewValueArrayToStringArrayArray=(arr,newValue)=>{if(newValue&&newValue.length>0){if(!arr.find(strArr=>strArr.length===newValue.length&&newValue.every(v=>strArr.includes(v)))){return[...arr,newValue];}}return arr;};export const addNewValueArrayToStringArray=(arr,newValue)=>{if(newValue&&newValue.length>0){return[...arr,...newValue.filter(v=>!arr.includes(v))];}return arr;};export const addNewValueToPerFieldExampleArray=(arr,field,newValue,fromId)=>{return newValue[field]?[...arr,{example:newValue[field],fromId,stride:[]}]:arr;};
